title: Are British Land Company plc & Land Securities Group plc In A Bubble?
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Aug 26, 2015, 21:56 BST - UK Markets closed Are British Land Company plc & Land Securities Group plc In A Bubble? By Owain Bennallack | Fool.co.uk â€“ 5 hours ago 1,228.00 -32.00 
Investors fleeing the slowdown in China and the rest of the world's emerging markets might well be tempted to seek shelter in the booming UK property market among the likes of British Land (LSE: BLND) and Land Securities (LSE: LAND). But according to investment bank Jefferies, that's a bubble ripe to pop...

Owain Bennallack owns shares in British Land. The Motley Fool UK has no position in any of the shares mentioned. We Fools don't all hold the same opinions, but we all believe that considering a diverse range of insights makes us better investors.
